tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE delivery_vehicle_movement (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zone_id INT,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    zone_id UUID NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES delivery_zones(zone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_movements (
    movement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
    movement_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    current_location GEOGRAPHY NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_status (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  status TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleMovements (
  movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
  zone_id INT NOT NULL,
  movement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES Vehicles(vehicle_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES DeliveryZones(zone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT NOT NULL,
  zone_id INT NOT NULL,
  assignment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES Drivers(driver_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES DeliveryZones(zone_id)
);
